title: AHS 1984 Theory Video
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: I want for Lana to come back as a reporter interviewing survivors...

I think Leslie Grossman and Matthew Morrison's characters will be married and running the camp. Also I believe Matthew's character and one of the younger males, possibly Cody Fern's character, will be having an affair. Then maybe in one scene Matthew's character will get a note or something telling him to meet the person he's cheating with and it will actually be the killer waiting there for him. I think the affair would make for an interesting story line.

I’m a bad subscriber because I don’t watch your videos all year long, but when it comes up to the time ahs starts, i tune in for almost every video and it always gets me super excited for the new season! I absolutely love the theory videos 💕
Emma played a "final girl" in Scream 4, who ended up being the killer using the trope to her advantage. Hmm.
There is a popular theory that Billie lord will play sally from hotel and that’s who Sarah will play. Thoughts?
description:
My theory for the characters and story line for AHS 1984.
